thread.title: BRIEF-Fosun International Reports 6.8 Pct Passive Stake In Amneal Pharma

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fosun International Reports 6.8 Pct Passive Stake In Amneal Pharma
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Fosun International Ltd:
* FOSUN INTERNATIONAL LIMITED REPORTS A 6.8 PERCENT PASSIVE STAKE IN AMNEAL PHARMACEUTICALS AS OF MAY 4 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2rHUZ2P ) Further company coverage:
